document.docAuthor: Ryabinin, Nikolay A., Liu, Dong, Gao, Meixiang & Wu, Dong-Hui
document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of oribatid mites (Acari, Oribatida) of the Russian Far East and Northeast of China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of oribatid mites (Acari, Oribatida) of the Russian Far East and Northeast of China

subSubSection.paragraph:
Multioppia wilsoni Aoki, 1964
— Jl —83 ( Wen 1990a , Wang, Hu & Yin 2000 ).

Oppiella (Moritzoppia) neerlandica (Oudemans, 1900)
— Pr , Kh —3, 27, 28, 29, 30, 31, 37, 38, 39, 48, 49; Jl —56 ( Wen 1990a , Wang, Hu & Yin 2000 ).

Oxyoppia uncinata Wen, 1993
— Jl —83 ( Wen 1990a , 1993, Wang, Hu & Yin 2000 ).

Ramusella baichengensis ( Zhao & Wen, 1992 )
— Jl —82 ( Zhao & Wen, 1992 , Wang, Hu & Yin 2000 ).

Ramusella sengbuschi Hammer, 1968
— Jl —61, 63, 64, 66, 70, 72, 73, 75, 82 ( Wen 1990a , Wang, Hu & Yin 2000 ).

Subiasella (Lalmoppia) incurva (Aoki, 1983)
— Jl —61 (
Chen et al . 1988
, Wang, Hu & Yin 2000 ).
